name: Bullet'nSurf
description:
DEVICE REQUIREMENTS
iPhone5s and newer.
---------------------------------------

Bullet'nSurf is Japanese style 'bullet hell' shooting game!

---------------------------------------

Shoot and ride on the wave of a return cartridge!
Extreme bullet hell Japanese style shooting game.
BULLET'N SURF

['Surf Rider' of the 4types that can be selected]
01:Wide and Narrow
This 'Surf Rider' with high flexibility which changes
and fights a wide shot and a concentration shot.

02:FREE STYLE
And free shots can be divided into left and right shot
Possible to switch the lock shot of front fixing!

03:SWORD MASTER
Close combat type range distance is short.
Can be used to 'Surf Sword' to open off the barrage!

('Surf Sword' charge by three at a certain time.
It can stock up to up to 12.)

04:GOLDEN TWIN TAIL

05:AUTO AIMING

* If you tap the weapon button in the lower right of the screen,
And switching of the shot, you can use 'Surf Sword'!


[Exhilarating new sensory system!]
Bullet-back shot 12way might occur if you defeat the enemy!
If you defeat the enemy to take further the bullet-back shot ...
Bullet-back shot occurs again! (Bullet Surf)
It is possible to shoot down enemy aircraft one after another in succession!
As you connect the bullet-back shot,
Also rise (score magnification) Surf rate, I can aim at a high score!

To increase the own machine and earn score, and try to achieve the all clear!
(8 Million Every extended setting.)
